description: Woodson Senior High School is committed to providing a standards-driven curriculum in which all students achieve at high levels. Woodson has a strong academic legacy and a history of impressive athletic achievement. In addition to offering a variety of extracurricular activities, including a National Honor Society, NJROTC Drill Team and Future Business Leaders of America, the school is also continuously increasing its STEM, AP and accelerated course offerings.
transit: 97 (East Capitol Street-Cardozo Line), U5 (Mayfair-Marshall Heights Line), U8 (Capitol Hts-Benning Hts Line)
